body.name: VITADE Streaming Webcam 1080P, 960A HD Web Camera USB Web Cam for Gaming Conferencing Video Chatting Mac Windows Desktop Computer Laptop Wide Angle Webcam with Ring Light & Microphone & Tripod

features: 【Pro Webcam for Streaming】Built-in ring light adjustable in 3 brightness with touch control and facial-enhancement technology optimize the image automatically and enable your video streaming look more professional. ★You can turn on the built in lighting by touching activated control on front. To adjust brightness (3 levels), touch again.★
【Full Hd 1080P Usb Webcam】: 960AF webcam with 80° wide angle lens captures high definition image and video at 1080p/30fps. Perfect for streaming on social media and gaming.

【H.264 Encoding Compression】: Advanced H.264 encoding compresses a digital video file so that it only occupies half the space of MPEG to deliver the same quality video. Enjoy stunning HD video with impressive video performance and faster transmission speed. Note: The tripod placed under the blister box.
【Light Correction & Autofocus】: Automatic low-light correction provide true-to-life video even in dim lighting conditions. Real time autofocus enables the webcam capture more details.

【Plug & Play 】: Quick and easy setup in 5 minutes. Compatible with Windows 7 8 10, Mac OS 10.6 and above. Supports Chrome OS, Android 5.0 or higher. Tripod-ready universal clip fits all laptops, Mac, LCD or monitors.
body.description: Vitade 960A HD 1080P Webcam with Ring Light The Vitade 960A has stripped away a lot of the bells and whistles that more premium webcams offer, focusing instead on what matters most to game streamers and YouTube vloggers – good image quality and lighting through a “Light Ring”. You don’t need to spend a ton of time configuring the stream – just plug in the Vitade webcam and get to work. The wideband mic delivers crystal clear audio, and making it a great choice for business conferencing and presentations. It features a familiar configuration of 1080p recording and 720p live video calling. It rotates 360 degrees, and can be mounted on a tripod with autofocus. Built-in ring light adjustable in 3 brightness with touch control and facial-enhancement technology optimize the image automatically and enable your video streaming look more professional. Compatible with Windows 7, Windows Windows 10 or later, and most video calling applications Mac OS 10.6 or later，Android v 5.0 or above, USB 2.0, plug and play. Register with Personify for VIP premium membership to enjoy video background change during live-broadcasting of the Xsplit game (Windows 7 and later). Note: If you are unable to access Windows 10's preinstalled Skype, please download the desktop version from the Skype official website.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Good Enough
reviews.reviewText: This was a replacement for my Microsoft Lifecam, which I had since about 2012. I was looking for something that would give me a crispier and clear production for my live stream podcasts. I was jealous of other YouTubers who seemed to have Hollywood Studio cameras. This little camera was definitely an upgrade over the Lifecam, but I'm still not where I want to be with quality, BUT I think this is good as I can get at this price. What I really like about the camera is that you can turn off all the lights in your office and just use the ring light and it gives your background the perfect dim, while highlighting your face perfectly. Although, the quality does look better with some light in the background. When it is completely dark, it tends to keep wanting to adjust and the coloring is inconsistent. I was unsure about its sturdiness on a Smart TV that I'm using as a monitor, but no problems. It holds great, except for those times that I kick the cord with my feet. I don't know how that's all going to end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tell all your friends.
reviews.reviewText: Functions honestly better than my $120 logitech, I've been streaming with this cam for two years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good... For the price
reviews.reviewText: It's got that weird soft blur of a cheap webcam. Which is OK, because it IS a cheap webcam. But don't let the "HD" fool you, just because it has a high pixel resolution doesn't mean it's a high quality image. I can't think of a single streamer that would use a camera of this low quality. It's probably fine for Zoom meetings, but don't try to make a YouTube video with this thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crystal Clear Picture
reviews.reviewText: I replaced my old USB camera with this one. The difference was amazing. Absolutely clear. Wish it had a capability to frame the shot (zoom in and out), but other than that, I am very pleased. I did not test the microphone because I have a separate Yeti Blue so I can't speak to the mic. The light feature is a great fill light at about 20" from camera. It supplements the room lighting very well. I have had several people ask me about my camera since I started using it, and my Pastor now has one for Streaming Worship Services each week. I continue to recommend it. Set up was very easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I had a heck of a time getting my Windows 10 computer to work with this camera and it was the settings on Windows. Why does Microsoft make it so hard? Anyway....I love the camera! Once I got it working, I chatted with a few family members and they all told me how good the video quality was. I will recommend the camera but tell you to beware of your computer settings if you are adding a webcam for the first time. This camera replaced an old Microsoft Show webcam that, ironically, does NOT work with Windows 10. If you spend a bunch of money on a Microsoft product, why can't it be backwards compatible? That is the main reason I replaced my webcam with a non-Microsoft product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the camera! Great webcam for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I had a heck of a time getting my Windows 10 computer to work with this camera and it was the settings on Windows. Why does Microsoft make it so hard? Anyway....I love the camera! Once I got it working, I chatted with a few family members and they all told me how good the video quality was. I will recommend the camera but tell you to beware of your computer settings if you are adding a webcam for the first time. This camera replaced an old Microsoft Show webcam that, ironically, does NOT work with Windows 10. If you spend a bunch of money on a Microsoft product, why can't it be backwards compatible? That is the main reason I replaced my webcam with a non-Microsoft product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plug it in and GO
reviews.reviewText: The camera stopped working on my Surface Pro and after some research I came across this brand of camera. This is easy to use and move to accommodate all settings. Worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Buzzing noise when light is on
reviews.reviewText: When I try to use the ring light, the people in the discord call I'm in say they can hear a ringing/buzzing sound. I don't use the mic on it so I'm not sure how its going across but it is. For camera use along, it works great. I bought for more than it sells for now so for that reason and the buzzing, I give 3 stars. There are probably ones of similar quality out there for cheaper.

This is great. This product is perfect. Ready to go - just plug-and-play right out of the box. Too bad it does not have a privacy cover, but that is easily fixed - I just put a small cloth bag over it, one I had from when I bought a necklace recently. Not sure about audio yet - haven't tried. But the camera is great. Very high quality. The colors are very natural and very clear. Works excellent with MS Teams, which is exactly what I need it for all day long - business meetings. Really a perfect camera for online business meetings.

Had this for over a year and used it only a few times.Really my only complaint is that the cord is too stiff so it gets in the way, and if you try to move it the camera will topple over. The cord needs to be more flexible so it can just dangle but it gets in the way and seems to only want to stay put in one direction.The cord, combined with the camera and mount, are altogether too heavy for the small tripod. The tripod legs are cheap plastic and weak, there's a lack of stability because there's no weight. So it can easily fall over if you move the cord or accidentally bump your desk.The camera itself is fine but quality doesn't look 1080p. I don't know what the resolution is but it doesn't take up the whole screen. The outer ring light is okay I guess but for me unnecessary because doesn't make much of a difference.The auto focus isn't the greatest. It often can't make up its mind about what to focus on unless you're stationary I guess. But doing crafts and if there's lots of movement it will go out of focus a lot and try to adjust itself. Which makes sense I guess but just be aware. And it's not like a phone you can press on the screen to focus a specific area.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's fine and easy going. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewText: I decided to spend a little bit more on a webcam, this is why I bought this one. The light ring is useful when my room is getting darker. The image quality is good. It worked great with Ubuntu. No configuration needed. I am very satisfied at the moment.

reviews.reviewTitle: Seems ok, but not for background blurring unless with the right hardware.
reviews.reviewText: March 2, 2022 The autofocus seems to work well, but I haven't had it long enough to get feedback from others on the receiving end. I'll report back.The seller says: "Background Replacement Please download Chromacam-2.2.1.14 on Windows. Register after installation, then you can change the background in a very simple way." Alas, that ONLY works if you have the hardware to support this feature, which isn't dependent on the camera but on the computer running the camera. I have a slightly older Intel i7 which doesn't meet the requirements of this feature and I have a not quite as old Intel i3 laptop which barely supports it.So, if you want background blurring or a replacement background, which I think is really neat, then first visit Zoom or Chromacam to see if your equipment meets the requirements of what is needed.Update March 16, 2022 Yesterday I was on an important Zoom call and, at first, the lighting was perfect and this was without using the ring light. Alas, the great lighting soon disappeared and it never returned notwithstanding using the ring light. So, when the seller says: "Automatic low-light correction provide true-to-life video even in dim lighting conditions." take this with a grain of salt. Fortunately, I'm still within the return period, which is what I'll likely do to find a webcam with more consistent lighting.
